data.title: Apply for Business License
data.meta_description: When applying for a business tax license or a minimal activity license, please provide the following: Business name, business address, business...
data.text:
When applying for a business tax license or a minimal activity license, please provide the following:

Business name, business address, business telephone number

Owner’s name(s), home address, home telephone number, social security number(s)

Copy of owner(s) driver license

Signature of owner(s)

The “Application for Business Tax License or Minimal Activity License” is available for printing.

The license fee will be $30 if your business is located within Nashville city limits (Urban Service District – USD) in order to obtain your business license or minimal activity license.

The license fee will be $15 if your business is located outside the Nashville city limits, but in Davidson County (General Service District – GSD) in order to obtain your business license or minimal activity license.
